title: SAT100 Unit 1 Current Non Sustainable Agriculture Practices

tasks.task: Farming Practices and Sustainable Agriculture Introduction
subtasks: Explaining the transition from native prairies to farmland
Discussing tillage practices (plowing, disking, cultivation, no-till)
Addressing synthetic fertilizers and their environmental impacts
Evaluating weed and pest control methods (herbicides, pesticides)
Analyzing the shift from small family farms to corporate agriculture
Identifying sustainability challenges and future considerations in farming
Highlighting the importance of sustainable practices to feed the growing population
